author: Muhamad Rafeek
review_text: Sohar Bank is improved a lot within the last year and achieved international standards. As an indian, i have experienced many benefits like there's no service fee for the international transfer to India and will be credited instantly , faster than any other bank in Oman. The mob app of Sohar bank is excellent, very easy and user friendly. The beneficieries via mob app can be added with minimum details and avtivated immediately.
